entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.3°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 8:45 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:45 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:45 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
